channel.title: [Pi] Teleblock barraging?

item.title: [Pi] Teleblock barraging?
item.dc:creator: @avirunes avirunes
item.description:
@avirunes wrote:

Hey i need help trying to fix teleblock barraging, where players can equip ancient staff while ancient magics are on and then click the spellbook icon and switch back to normal magic and then set the ancient staff to barrage so they have normal magic but auto cast barraging = barrage and tele-blocked.

i tried replacing

public void resetAutocast() {
c.autocastId = 0;
c.autocasting = false;
c.getPA().sendFrame36(108, 0);
}

with

public void resetAutocast() {
c.autocastId = -1;
c.autocasting = false;
c.setSidebarInterface(0, 328);
c.getPA().sendFrame36(108, 0);
c.getItems().sendWeapon(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon], c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]));
}

but it didnt do anything

Read full topic
